verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even until \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, all that \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

This \add shall be\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \add about\add* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*:

¶ And when the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* setteth \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and they shall take \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* with it:

And shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* thereon the \w covering|strong="H3681"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w over|strong="H4605"\w* \add it\add* a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* \w wholly|strong="H3632"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof.

And upon the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* of \w shewbread|strong="H6440"\w* they shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* thereon the \w dishes|strong="H7086"\w*, and the \w spoons|strong="H3709"\w*, and the \w bowls|strong="H4518"\w*, and \w covers|strong="H7184"\w* to cover \w withal|strong="H5262"\w*: and the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* shall be thereon:\f + \fr 4.7 \ft cover…: or, pour out withal\f*

And they shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* upon them a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* of \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the same with a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof.

And they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* of the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, and his \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, and his \w tongs|strong="H4457"\w*, and his \w snuffdishes|strong="H4289"\w*, and all the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, wherewith they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto it:

And they shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof within a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon a \w bar|strong="H4132"\w*.

And upon the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* they shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* it with a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* to the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof:

And they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w ministry|strong="H8335"\w*, wherewith they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* in a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* them with a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* on a \w bar|strong="H4132"\w*:
And they shall take away the \w ashes|strong="H1878"\w* from the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w purple|strong="H0713"\w* \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* thereon:

And they shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon it all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, wherewith they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* about it, \add even\add* the \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, the \w fleshhooks|strong="H4207"\w*, and the \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, and the \w basons|strong="H4219"\w*, all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; and they shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* upon it a \w covering|strong="H3681"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* to the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* of it.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft basons: or, bowls\f*

And when \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* have made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w covering|strong="H3680"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, as the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* is to set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*; \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \add it:\add* but they shall not \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \add any\add* holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*, lest they \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. These \add things are\add* the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

¶ And to the \w office|strong="H6486"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \add pertaineth\add* the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, and the \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \add and\add* the \w oversight|strong="H6486"\w* of all the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and of all that therein \add is\add*, in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and in the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Cut ye not \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:

But thus \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them, that they may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, when they \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* them \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w service|strong="H5656"\w* and to his \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*:
But they shall not go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* when the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* are \w covered|strong="H1104"\w*, lest they \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* also the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, throughout the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*;

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* until \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* shalt thou \w number|strong="H6485"\w* them; all that enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w perform|strong="H6633"\w* the \w service|strong="H6635"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 4.23 \ft to perform…: Heb. to war the warfare\f*

This \add is\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, and for \w burdens|strong="H4853"\w*:\f + \fr 4.24 \ft burdens: or, carriage\f*

And they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, his \w covering|strong="H4372"\w*, and the \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of the \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* skins that \add is\add* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon it, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

And the \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* and by the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and their \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, and all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, and all that is \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for them: so shall they \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*.

At the \w appointment|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall be all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w*, in all their \w burdens|strong="H4853"\w*, and in all their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*: and ye shall \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* unto them in \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* all their \w burdens|strong="H4853"\w*.\f + \fr 4.27 \ft appointment: Heb. mouth\f*

This \add is\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1649"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and their \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \add shall be\add* under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

¶ As for the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, thou shalt \w number|strong="H6485"\w* them after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*;

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even unto \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* shalt thou \w number|strong="H6485"\w* them, every one that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w service|strong="H6635"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 4.30 \ft service: Heb. warfare\f*

And this \add is\add* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of their \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, according to all their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*; the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof, and the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* thereof, and \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* thereof,

And the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*, and their \w pins|strong="H3489"\w*, and their \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, with all their \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w*, and with all their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*: and by \w name|strong="H8034"\w* ye shall \w reckon|strong="H6485"\w* the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of their \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, according to all their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, and after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even unto \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, every one that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w service|strong="H6635"\w*, for the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* were two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

These \add were\add* they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*, all that might do \w service|strong="H5647"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* did \w number|strong="H6485"\w* according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, and by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even unto \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, every one that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w service|strong="H6635"\w*, for the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

Even those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, were two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*.

These \add are\add* they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, of all that might do \w service|strong="H5647"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* did \w number|strong="H6485"\w* according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even unto \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, every one that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w service|strong="H6635"\w*, for the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

Even those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, were \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

These \add be\add* those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

All those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, and after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

From \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* even unto \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, every one that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the service of the \w ministry|strong="H5656"\w*, and the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

Even those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, were \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w*.

According to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, and according to his \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*: thus were they \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of him, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
